scripts.build: npm run --silent build:rollup && npm run --silent build:webextension
scripts.build:webextension: npm run --silent build:patch:manifest && npm run --silent build:patch
scripts.output: rimraf ./dist/web-ext-artifacts/ && web-ext --source-dir=./artifacts/webext/ build && mkdirp ./dist/publish && mv -n ./dist/web-ext-artifacts/talkie*.zip "./dist/publish/talkie-joelpurra.com-$(cd ../../ && npm run --silent version:get:head)-webextension.zip"
scripts.publish: web-ext --source-dir=./artifacts/webext/ sign --channel listed && mv -n ./dist/web-ext-artifacts/talkie*.xpi "./dist/publish/talkie-joelpurra.com-$(cd ../../ && npm run --silent version:get:head)-webextension.xpi" && echo 'NOTE: Manually upload source code and check upload status on https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/developers/addons'
